#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
double dp[320][320];
double C[320][320];
void Preprocess()
{
	for(int i = 0;i<=300;i++)
	{
		C[i][0] = 1;
		for(int j = 1;j<=i;j++)
		{
			C[i][j] = C[i-1][j-1] + C[i-1][j];
		}
	}
	for(int i = 0;i<=300;i++)
	{
		for(int j = 0;j<=300;j++)
		{
			dp[i][j] = -1.0;
		}
	}
}
double calc(int N,int M)
{
	if(M==0)
		return 0;
	double &Res = dp[N][M];
	if(Res<0)
	{
		Res = 0;
		for(int i = 0;i<=N;i++)
		{
			int val1 = i>0;
			int val2 = N-i>0;
			Res+=(val1 + val2 + calc(i,M-1) + calc(N-i,M-1))*C[N][i];
		}
		for(int i = 1;i<=N;i++)
			Res/=2;
	}	
	return Res;
}
int main()
{
	Preprocess();
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		int N,L;
		cin>>N>>L;
		printf("%.2lf\n",calc(N,L)+1.0);
	}
	return 0;
}
